summary: ROLLED THE WINDOW DOWN ON THE DRIVER FRONT DOOR AND THERE WAS A LOUD BANG,  THE WINDOW WOULD NOT ROLL BACK UP. THOUGHT THE GLASS HAD BROKEN.  WENT TO A REPAIR SHOP AND WAS TOLD THE GLASS WAS NOT BROKEN, THE WINDOW REGULATOR HAD BROKEN.  HAD JUST PULLED OUT OF MY PARKING SPACE IN FRONT OF MY DOOR.
